home.name: Jun Kai
home.aboutMe:
Software developer with a passion for frontend technologies.

Extensive experience in Web, Mobile application and Desktop application development; in both frontend and backend, both at startup and large company. Adept understanding of AI/ML gained through research project.

cvDialog.title: Here's my CV
cvDialog.description: Put in a good word to HR!

emailDialog.title: Get in touch with me
emailDialog.description: Hey! One more step to get in touch with me. I will try my best to reply ASAP!

kipo.bullet1: Developed systems to make millions of parts searchable, integrating web search and live pricing and lead-time tracking.
kipo.bullet2: Engineered platform to extract datasheet symbols and export them into industry-standard formats.
kipo.bullet3: Built tools to convert Bill of Materials into actionables, enabling automated sourcing and the identification of alternatives.

dsbj.bullet1: Developed a model visualization platform using Python and Next.js that integrated LLM-based diagnostic tools to automate data interpretation, enabling stakeholders to gain natural language insights from complex mathematical models.
dsbj.bullet2: Centralized and deployed a Single Sign-On (SSO) framework using NestJS, unifying authentication across multiple internal applications to enhance organizational security.

works.position: Mobile Application and Web Application Developer Intern
works.bullet1: Accelerated product development for a mid-sized startup by authoring approximately 80% of the total codebase across both Flutter mobile and Angular web platforms during the internship tenure.
works.bullet2: Delivered cross-platform feature parity by developing high-impact components, including a real-time chat interface, secure payment processing modules, and a fully mobile-responsive UI.

ai4x.title: Quantifying Uncertainty in Physics-Informed Neural Networks
ai4x.description: We used deep evidential regression to quantify uncertainties in physics-informed neural networks, demonstrating it on the Burgers and Laplace experiments.
ai4x.abstract: We integrate a state-of-the-art method to quantify aleatoric and epistemic uncertainties in physics-informed neural networks and observe that they can be captured effectively while maintaining predictive accuracy.

ntu.bullet1: Elective Focus in Security & Artificial Intelligence

oceanfrontHardware.name: Oceanfront Hardware
oceanfrontHardware.description: Freelanced as a full-stack web developer for this hardware company. Focused on SEO performance and CMS integration.
oceanfrontHardware.bullet1: Architected and deployed a full-stack B2B e-commerce platform using Vue.js and Strapi, supporting a catalog of 800 active SKUs.
oceanfrontHardware.bullet2: Engineered a migration from Vue.js to Next.js, leveraging Server-Side Rendering (SSR) to optimize Core Web Vitals and secure top-tier Google search rankings against industry competitors.
oceanfrontHardware.bullet3: Optimized product discoverability by implementing Meilisearch, reducing search query latency by 97% (from 700ms to 20ms) and enabling instant, typo-tolerant filtering for the B2B catalog.
